dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Well, well, what do we have here? Another fool who thinks they can conquer the Darkened Veil. What brings you to my shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come for power, Zelrok. Join me, and you will be rewarded.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! What makes you think I need your rewards when I have shadows to play with?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows are but fleeting; my dominion will be eternal.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Quite confident, aren't you? Show me your strength, then.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, prepare yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance will be your downfall. Let’s see if you have what it takes!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Strength isn't the only path. We can share the spoils.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmm, sharing sounds weak, but perhaps the shadows need a stronger ally.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate the dark power I possess.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Big words, little substance. Let’s test your mettle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will regret doubting me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I doubt I will. Enough talk, fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Or perhaps we could form an unholy alliance and crush the light together?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance? Interesting. The shadows speak highly of your potential.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I’ve no time for banter. Step aside, or face annihilation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Force over words, eh? Fine by me. En garde!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Consider it your final warning.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Warnings are for the weak. Let’s end this.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, face your fate.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Come then, I thrive in combat!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to unleash true darkness upon the world, greater than any shadow you command.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold claim! What makes you think you can outdarken me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My power dwarfs yours; join me or be crushed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Let’s see if your strength is as great as your words!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare for battle, then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I accept your challenge. Let’s dance in the shadows!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Spare yourself and join my ranks.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fine, I’ll give you a chance. But cross me, and you’ll wish you hadn’t.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Or we can rule together, spreading fear and darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spreading fear does sound tempting. Perhaps you are worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, none shall oppose us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, let’s terrify the world.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will see the wisdom in my words soon enough.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph. I might. For now, you have my attention.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, or be obliterated by the darkness I command.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You think you can scare me with threats? I thrive on them!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You’ve been warned.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough. Your arrogance ends now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The choice is yours, make it wisely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Hah! I choose battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you wish to linger in the shadows or rise to true power?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: True power, you say? What would a mere mortal know of it?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I know the taste of conquest, unlike any other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words, words. Let’s see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk, let’s fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Finally, action! Bring it on!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me and taste victory together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Victory... a tempting offer. Alright, I’m in.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your shadows can be a key to might unimaginable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Might unimaginable, you say? Convince me further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power combined with mine will be unstoppable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You make a convincing proposition. Let’s join forces.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Or perhaps you’d prefer to stay insignificant.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insignificant? Your arrogance infuriates me. Prepare to fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You have a choice: dwell in shadows or conquer the world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! You presume too much. The shadows are my refuge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A refuge or a cage? Choose wisely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I grow tired of this. Leave now, lest I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Stay in your shadows then, I will find true power elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run along, darkling. I have no time for pretenders.
